description: Connect AI agents to Atlassian Jira and Confluence to query data and perform actions through a standardized interface. Enable seamless management of issues, projects, pages, and comments directly from AI assistants. Simplify workflows and reduce context switching for developers and teams using Atlassian tools.

mcpServerName.description: Optional custom name for the MCP server

mcpServerVersion.description: Optional custom version for the MCP server

atlassianSiteName.description: Your Atlassian site name or URL (e.g., example.atlassian.net or https://example.atlassian.net)

atlassianUserEmail.description: Email address associated with your Atlassian account

capabilities.name: createIssue
capabilities.description: Create a new issue in Jira

capabilities.name: updateIssue
capabilities.description: Update information of a Jira issue

capabilities.name: transitionIssue
capabilities.description: Transition the status of a Jira issue

capabilities.name: assignIssue
capabilities.description: Assign a Jira issue to a user

capabilities.name: createFilter
capabilities.description: Create a new filter in Jira

capabilities.name: updateFilter
capabilities.description: Update an existing filter in Jira

capabilities.name: deleteFilter
capabilities.description: Delete a filter in Jira

capabilities.name: createSprint
capabilities.description: Create a new sprint in Jira

capabilities.name: startSprint
capabilities.description: Start a Jira sprint

capabilities.name: closeSprint
capabilities.description: Close a Jira sprint

capabilities.name: addIssuesToBacklog
capabilities.description: Move issue(s) to Jira backlog (POST /rest/agile/1.0/backlog/issue or /rest/agile/1.0/backlog/{boardId}/issue)

capabilities.name: rankBacklogIssues
capabilities.description: Rank issues in Jira backlog

capabilities.name: createDashboard
capabilities.description: Create a new Jira dashboard

capabilities.name: updateDashboard
capabilities.description: Update a Jira dashboard

capabilities.name: addGadgetToDashboard
capabilities.description: Add gadget to Jira dashboard (POST /rest/api/3/dashboard/{dashboardId}/gadget)

capabilities.name: removeGadgetFromDashboard
capabilities.description: Remove gadget from Jira dashboard

capabilities.name: createPage

capabilities.name: updatePage
capabilities.description: Update the content and information of a Confluence page

capabilities.name: addComment
capabilities.description: Add a comment to a Confluence page

capabilities.name: deletePage
capabilities.description: Delete a Confluence page (API v2)

capabilities.name: updatePageTitle
capabilities.description: Update the title of a Confluence page (API v2)

capabilities.name: updateFooterComment
capabilities.description: Update a footer comment in Confluence (API v2)

capabilities.name: deleteFooterComment
capabilities.description: Delete a footer comment in Confluence (API v2)

capabilities.name: addIssueToSprint
capabilities.description: Add issues to a Jira sprint (POST /rest/agile/1.0/sprint/{sprintId}/issue)
